description:
At the Anastopoulo Law Firm, we provide focused personal injury representation. Our team aggressively advocates on behalf of those injured through no fault of their own, working to see them made as close to financially whole as possible for their injury-associated losses. We have office locations in Greenville, South Carolina, as well as in North Charleston, Charleston, Columbia, Myrtle Beach and Florence, and Charlotte and Lumberton, North Carolina.

Having more than 25 years of legal experience, our team zealously pursues the maximum damages on behalf of our clients. We handle wide-ranging cases, including those involving matters such as the following:

  • Motor vehicle and truck accidents
  • Birth injuries and medical malpractice
  • Premises liability
  • Product liability
  • Animal bites
  • Workers' compensation

Our law firm team also represents clients with wrongful death claims, aiding the families of those killed as a result of the negligent or reckless actions, or the inaction, of others. We know that a price cannot be placed on the life of the loved ones our clients lost; however, our attorneys work to help them recover compensation that may provide much-needed assistance as they grieve and adjust to life without their family members.

Beginning with a free initial consultation until their cases are resolved to their satisfaction, our team at the Anastopoulo Law Firm works closely with our clients. We recognize that going up against the insurance company or pursuing legal action to recover damages may seem a daunting undertaking. Driven by our clients' needs and objectives, our attorneys will not be deterred, nor will we allow our clients to be pushed into unfair settlements.
